name: WooCommerce privious order list for repeat order
author: CMexpertise

sections.description:
This plugin is very simple to use. Just install and activate. Ready!

This plugin will add the “order again” button for all orders marked as “Completed”.

And also add order again button in only display customer last order.

Using this plugin you can list all the privios order which you have placed.you can only see also only last order placed.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin files to your plugins folder, or install using WordPress built-in Add New Plugin installer;
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload plugin files to your plugins folder, or install using WordPress built-in Add New Plugin installer;
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: Just add an "order again" button in Recent Orders list
